 6299: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6300: 
 6301: sc_lc_receive_response_tcp(InitState) ->
 6302:     %% This (acceptor) is the server that accepts connections.
 6303:     %% But it is also suppose to close the connection socket, 
 6304:     %% and trigger the read failure (=closed) for the handler process.
 6305:     AcceptorSeq =
 6306:         [
 6307:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 6308:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 6309:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 6310:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 6311:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 6312:                    end},
 6313:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 6314:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6315:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 6316:                            ok
 6317:                    end},
 6318: 
 6319:          %% *** Init part ***
 6320:          #{desc => "which local address",
 6321:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 6322:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 6323:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
 6324:                    end},
 6325:          #{desc => "create (listen) socket",
 6326:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
 6327:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 6328:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
 6329:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 6330:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
 6331:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6332:                                    ERROR
 6333:                            end
 6334:                    end},
 6335:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 6336:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
 6337:                          lsock  := LSock,
 6338:                          lsa    := LSA} = _State) ->
 6339:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("bind to LSA: "
 6340:                                        "~n   ~p", [LSA]),
 6341:                            case socket:bind(LSock, LSA) of
 6342:                                ok ->
 6343:                                    ok; % We do not care about the port for local
 6344:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6345:                                    ERROR
 6346:                            end;
 6347:                       (#{lsock := LSock,
 6348:                          lsa   := LSA} = State) ->
 6349:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
 6350:                                ok ->
 6351:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
 6352:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("bound to port: ~w", [Port]),
 6353:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
 6354:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6355:                                    ERROR
 6356:                            end
 6357:                    end},
 6358:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
 6359:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
 6360:                            socket:listen(LSock)
 6361:                    end},
 6362:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 6363:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
 6364:                          tester := Tester,
 6365:                          lsa    := #{path := Path}}) ->
 6366:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Path),
 6367:                            ok;
 6368:                       (#{tester := Tester, lport := Port}) ->
 6369:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
 6370:                            ok
 6371:                    end},
 6372:                            
 6373:          %% The actual test
 6374:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
 6375:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 6376:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept) of
 6377:                                {ok, {H1, H2, H3}} ->
 6378:                                    {ok, State#{handler1 => H1,
 6379:                                                handler2 => H2,
 6380:                                                handler3 => H3}};
 6381:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6382:                                    ERROR
 6383:                            end
 6384:                    end},
 6385:          #{desc => "await accept",
 6386:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 6387:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
 6388:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 6389:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("connection accepted: "
 6390:                                                "~n   ~p", [socket:sockname(Sock)]),
 6391:                                    {ok, State#{csock => Sock}};
 6392:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6393:                                    ERROR
 6394:                            end
 6395:                    end},
 6396:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
 6397:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6398:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
 6399:                            ok
 6400:                    end},
 6401:          #{desc => "transfer connection to handler 1",
 6402:            cmd  => fun(#{handler1 := Handler, csock := Sock}) ->
 6403:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Handler, transfer, Sock),
 6404:                            ok
 6405:                    end},
 6406:          #{desc => "transfer connection to handler 2",
 6407:            cmd  => fun(#{handler2 := Handler, csock := Sock}) ->
 6408:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Handler, transfer, Sock),
 6409:                            ok
 6410:                    end},
 6411:          #{desc => "transfer connection to handler 3",
 6412:            cmd  => fun(#{handler3 := Handler, csock := Sock}) ->
 6413:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Handler, transfer, Sock),
 6414:                            ok
 6415:                    end},
 6416:          #{desc => "await continue (close)",
 6417:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6418:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, close),
 6419:                            ok
 6420:                    end},
 6421:          #{desc => "close connection socket",
 6422:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock} = State) ->
 6423:                            case socket:close(Sock) of
 6424:                                ok ->
 6425:                                    {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)};
 6426:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6427:                                    ERROR
 6428:                            end
 6429:                    end},
 6430:          #{desc => "announce ready (close)",
 6431:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6432:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, close),
 6433:                            ok
 6434:                    end},
 6435: 
 6436:          %% *** Terminate ***
 6437:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 6438:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 6439:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 6440:                                ok ->
 6441:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 6442:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6443:                                    ERROR
 6444:                            end
 6445:                    end},
 6446:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
 6447:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
 6448:                          lsock  := Sock,
 6449:                          lsa    := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
 6450:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 6451:                            State1 =
 6452:                                unlink_path(Path,
 6453:                                            fun() ->maps:remove(lsa, State) end,
 6454:                                            fun() -> State end),
 6455:                            State2 = maps:remove(lsock, State1),
 6456:                            State3 = maps:remove(lport, State2),
 6457:                            {ok, State3};
 6458:                       (#{lsock := Sock} = State) ->
 6459:                            case socket:close(Sock) of
 6460:                                ok ->
 6461:                                    State1 = maps:remove(lsock, State),
 6462:                                    State2 = maps:remove(lport, State1),
 6463:                                    {ok, State2};
 6464:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6465:                                    ERROR
 6466:                            end
 6467:                    end},
 6468: 
 6469:          %% *** We are done ***
 6470:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 6471:         ],
 6472: 
 6473:     %% The point of this is to perform the recv for which
 6474:     %% we are testing the response.
 6475:     HandlerSeq =
 6476:         [
 6477:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 6478:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 6479:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 6480:                            {Tester, Acceptor} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 6481:                            {ok, State#{tester  => Tester, 
 6482:                                       acceptor => Acceptor}}
 6483:                    end},
 6484:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 6485:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6486:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 6487:                            ok
 6488:                    end},
 6489:          #{desc => "monitor acceptor",
 6490:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Acceptor} = _State) ->
 6491:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Acceptor),
 6492:                            ok
 6493:                    end},
 6494:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 6495:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6496:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 6497:                            ok
 6498:                    end},
 6499: 
 6500:          %% The actual test
 6501:          #{desc => "await continue (transfer)",
 6502:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Pid} = State) ->
 6503:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Pid, acceptor, transfer) of
 6504:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 6505:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 6506:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6507:                                    ERROR
 6508:                            end
 6509:                    end},
 6510:          #{desc => "announce ready (transfer)",
 6511:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6512:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, transfer),
 6513:                            ok
 6514:                    end},
 6515:          #{desc => "attempt recv (=> closed)",
 6516:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv} = State) ->
 6517:                            %% ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
 6518:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 6519:                                {ok, _Data} ->
 6520:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected data received"),
 6521:                                    {error, unexpected_success};
 6522:                                {error, closed} ->
 6523:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected 'closed' "
 6524:                                                "result"),
 6525:                                    State1 = maps:remove(sock, State),
 6526:                                    {ok, State1};
 6527:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 6528:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected read failure: "
 6529:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 6530:                                    ERROR
 6531:                            end
 6532:                    end},
 6533:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv closed)",
 6534:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6535:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_closed),
 6536:                            ok
 6537:                    end},
 6538: 
 6539:          %% *** Terminate ***
 6540:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 6541:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 6542:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 6543:                                ok ->
 6544:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 6545:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6546:                                    ERROR
 6547:                            end
 6548:                    end},
 6549: 
 6550: 
 6551:          %% *** We are done ***
 6552:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 6553:         ],
 6554: 
 6555:     %% The point of this is basically just to create the connection.
 6556:     ClientSeq =
 6557:         [
 6558:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 6559:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 6560:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 6561:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 6562:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 6563:                    end},
 6564:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 6565:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6566:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 6567:                            ok
 6568:                    end},
 6569: 
 6570:          %% *** Init part ***
 6571:          #{desc => "which local address",
 6572:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 6573:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 6574:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
 6575:                    end},
 6576:          #{desc => "create socket",
 6577:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
 6578:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 6579:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
 6580:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 6581:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 6582:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6583:                                    ERROR
 6584:                            end
 6585:                    end},
 6586:          #{desc => "bind socket to local address",
 6587:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
 6588:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("bind to LSA: "
 6589:                                        "~n   ~p", [LSA]),
 6590:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 6591:                                ok ->
 6592:                                    ok;
 6593:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6594:                                    ERROR
 6595:                            end
 6596:                    end},
 6597:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 6598:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6599:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 6600:                            ok
 6601:                    end},
 6602: 
 6603:          %% The actual test
 6604:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
 6605:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local = Domain,
 6606:                          tester := Tester} = State) ->
 6607:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect) of
 6608:                                {ok, ServerPath} ->
 6609:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Server Path: "
 6610:                                                "~n   ~s", [ServerPath]),
 6611:                                    ServerSA = #{family => Domain,
 6612:                                                 path   => ServerPath},
 6613:                                    {ok, State#{server_sa => ServerSA}};
 6614:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6615:                                    ERROR
 6616:                            end;
 6617:                       (#{tester := Tester, local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
 6618:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect) of
 6619:                                {ok, Port} ->
 6620:                                    ServerSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 6621:                                    {ok, State#{server_sa => ServerSA}};
 6622:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6623:                                    ERROR
 6624:                            end
 6625:                    end},
 6626:          #{desc => "connect to server",
 6627:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := ServerSA}) ->
 6628:                            socket:connect(Sock, ServerSA)
 6629:                    end},
 6630:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
 6631:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6632:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
 6633:                            ok
 6634:                    end},
 6635: 
 6636:          %% *** Terminate ***
 6637:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 6638:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 6639:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 6640:                                ok ->
 6641:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 6642:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6643:                                    ERROR
 6644:                            end                           
 6645:                    end},
 6646:          #{desc => "close socket",
 6647:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
 6648:                          sock     := Sock,
 6649:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
 6650:                            sock_close(Sock),
 6651:                            State1 =
 6652:                                unlink_path(Path,
 6653:                                            fun() ->
 6654:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
 6655:                                            end,
 6656:                                            fun() -> State end),
 6657:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State1)};
 6658:                        (#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 6659:                            sock_close(Sock),
 6660:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 6661:                    end},
 6662: 
 6663:          %% *** We are done ***
 6664:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 6665:         ],
 6666: 
 6667:     TesterSeq =
 6668:         [
 6669:          %% *** Init part ***
 6670:          #{desc => "monitor acceptor",
 6671:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Pid} = _State) ->
 6672:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 6673:                            ok
 6674:                    end},
 6675:          #{desc => "monitor handler 1",
 6676:            cmd  => fun(#{handler1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6677:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 6678:                            ok
 6679:                    end},
 6680:          #{desc => "monitor handler 2",
 6681:            cmd  => fun(#{handler2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6682:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 6683:                            ok
 6684:                    end},
 6685:          #{desc => "monitor handler 3",
 6686:            cmd  => fun(#{handler3 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6687:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 6688:                            ok
 6689:                    end},
 6690:          #{desc => "monitor client",
 6691:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 6692:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 6693:                            ok
 6694:                    end},
 6695: 
 6696:          %% Start the acceptor
 6697:          #{desc => "order acceptor start",
 6698:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Pid} = _State) ->
 6699:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 6700:                            ok
 6701:                    end},
 6702:          #{desc => "await acceptor ready (init)",
 6703:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Pid} = State) ->
 6704:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, acceptor, init) of
 6705:                                {ok, PortOrPath} ->
 6706:                                    {ok, State#{server_info => PortOrPath}};
 6707:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6708:                                    ERROR
 6709:                            end
 6710:                    end},
 6711: 
 6712:          %% Start the handler(s)
 6713:          #{desc => "order handler 1 start",
 6714:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Acceptor, handler1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6715:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Acceptor),
 6716:                            ok
 6717:                    end},
 6718:          #{desc => "await handler 1 ready (init)",
 6719:            cmd  => fun(#{handler1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6720:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, handler1, init)
 6721:                    end},
 6722:          #{desc => "order handler 2 start",
 6723:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Acceptor, handler2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6724:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Acceptor),
 6725:                            ok
 6726:                    end},
 6727:          #{desc => "await handler 2 ready (init)",
 6728:            cmd  => fun(#{handler2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6729:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, handler2, init)
 6730:                    end},
 6731:          #{desc => "order handler 3 start",
 6732:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Acceptor, handler3 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6733:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Acceptor),
 6734:                            ok
 6735:                    end},
 6736:          #{desc => "await handler 3 ready (init)",
 6737:            cmd  => fun(#{handler3 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6738:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, handler3, init)
 6739:                    end},
 6740: 
 6741:          %% Start the client
 6742:          #{desc => "order client start",
 6743:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 6744:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 6745:                            ok
 6746:                    end},
 6747:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
 6748:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 6749:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
 6750:                    end},
 6751: 
 6752:          %% The actual test
 6753:          #{desc => "order acceptor to continue (accept)",
 6754:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Pid, 
 6755:                          handler1 := H1, 
 6756:                          handler2 := H2, 
 6757:                          handler3 := H3} = _State) ->
 6758:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, accept, {H1, H2, H3}),
 6759:                            ok
 6760:                    end},
 6761:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 6762:          #{desc => "order client to continue (connect)",
 6763:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid, server_info := Info} = _State) ->
 6764:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, connect, Info),
 6765:                            ok
 6766:                    end},
 6767:          #{desc => "await acceptor ready (accept)",
 6768:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Pid} = _State) ->
 6769:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, acceptor, accept)
 6770:                    end},
 6771:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
 6772:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 6773:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, connect)
 6774:                    end},
 6775:          #{desc => "await handler 1 ready (transfer)",
 6776:            cmd  => fun(#{handler1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6777:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, handler1, transfer)
 6778:                    end},
 6779:          #{desc => "await handler 2 ready (transfer)",
 6780:            cmd  => fun(#{handler2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6781:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, handler2, transfer)
 6782:                    end},
 6783:          #{desc => "await handler 3 ready (transfer)",
 6784:            cmd  => fun(#{handler3 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6785:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, handler3, transfer)
 6786:                    end},
 6787:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 6788:          #{desc => "order acceptor to continue (close connection socket)",
 6789:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Pid} = _State) ->
 6790:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, close),
 6791:                            ok
 6792:                    end},
 6793:          #{desc => "await acceptor ready (close)",
 6794:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Pid} = _State) ->
 6795:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, acceptor, close)
 6796:                    end},
 6797:          #{desc => "await handler 1 ready (recv closed)",
 6798:            cmd  => fun(#{handler1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6799:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, handler1, recv_closed)
 6800:                    end},
 6801:          #{desc => "await handler 2 ready (recv closed)",
 6802:            cmd  => fun(#{handler2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6803:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, handler2, recv_closed)
 6804:                    end},
 6805:          #{desc => "await handler 3 ready (recv closed)",
 6806:            cmd  => fun(#{handler3 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6807:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, handler3, recv_closed)
 6808:                    end},
 6809: 
 6810:          %% Terminations
 6811:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
 6812:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 6813:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 6814:                            ok
 6815:                    end},
 6816:          #{desc => "await client termination",
 6817:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = State) ->
 6818:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 6819:                                ok ->
 6820:                                    {ok, maps:remove(client, State)};
 6821:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6822:                                    ERROR
 6823:                            end
 6824:                    end},
 6825:          #{desc => "order handler 1 to terminate",
 6826:            cmd  => fun(#{handler1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6827:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 6828:                            ok
 6829:                    end},
 6830:          #{desc => "await handler 1 termination",
 6831:            cmd  => fun(#{handler1 := Pid} = State) ->
 6832:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 6833:                                ok ->
 6834:                                    {ok, maps:remove(handler1, State)};
 6835:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6836:                                    ERROR
 6837:                            end
 6838:                    end},
 6839:          #{desc => "order handler 2 to terminate",
 6840:            cmd  => fun(#{handler2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6841:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 6842:                            ok
 6843:                    end},
 6844:          #{desc => "await handler 2 termination",
 6845:            cmd  => fun(#{handler2 := Pid} = State) ->
 6846:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 6847:                                ok ->
 6848:                                    {ok, maps:remove(handler2, State)};
 6849:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6850:                                    ERROR
 6851:                            end
 6852:                    end},
 6853:          #{desc => "order handler 3 to terminate",
 6854:            cmd  => fun(#{handler3 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6855:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 6856:                            ok
 6857:                    end},
 6858:          #{desc => "await handler 3 termination",
 6859:            cmd  => fun(#{handler3 := Pid} = State) ->
 6860:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 6861:                                ok ->
 6862:                                    {ok, maps:remove(handler3, State)};
 6863:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6864:                                    ERROR
 6865:                            end
 6866:                    end},
 6867:          #{desc => "order acceptor to terminate",
 6868:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Pid} = _State) ->
 6869:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 6870:                            ok
 6871:                    end},
 6872:          #{desc => "await acceptor termination",
 6873:            cmd  => fun(#{acceptor := Pid} = State) ->
 6874:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 6875:                                ok ->
 6876:                                    {ok, maps:remove(acceptor, State)};
 6877:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6878:                                    ERROR
 6879:                            end
 6880:                    end},
 6881: 
 6882: 
 6883:          %% *** We are done ***
 6884:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 6885:         ],
 6886: 
 6887:     i("start acceptor evaluator"),
 6888:     AccInitState = InitState,
 6889:     Acceptor = ?SEV_START("acceptor", AcceptorSeq, AccInitState),
 6890: 
 6891:     i("start handler 1 evaluator"),
 6892:     HandlerInitState = #{recv => maps:get(recv, InitState)},
 6893:     Handler1 = ?SEV_START("handler-1", HandlerSeq, HandlerInitState),
 6894: 
 6895:     i("start handler 2 evaluator"),
 6896:     Handler2 = ?SEV_START("handler-2", HandlerSeq, HandlerInitState),
 6897: 
 6898:     i("start handler 3 evaluator"),
 6899:     Handler3 = ?SEV_START("handler-3", HandlerSeq, HandlerInitState),
 6900: 
 6901:     i("start client evaluator"),
 6902:     ClientInitState = InitState,
 6903:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, ClientInitState),
 6904: 
 6905:     i("start tester evaluator"),
 6906:     TesterInitState = #{acceptor => Acceptor#ev.pid,
 6907:                         handler1 => Handler1#ev.pid,
 6908:                         handler2 => Handler2#ev.pid,
 6909:                         handler3 => Handler3#ev.pid,
 6910:                         client   => Client#ev.pid},
 6911:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 6912: 
 6913:     i("await evaluator"),
 6914:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Acceptor, 
 6915:                             Handler1, Handler2, Handler3, 
 6916:                             Client, Tester]).
 6917: 
 6918: 
 6919: 
 6920: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6921: %% This test case is intended to test what happens when a socket is 
 6922: %% locally closed while a process is calling the recvfrom function.
 6923: %% Socket is IPv4.
 6924: %% 
 6925: 
 6926: sc_lc_recvfrom_response_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 6927:     ?TT(?SECS(30)),
 6928:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 6929:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 6930:            fun() ->
 6931:                    Recv      = fun(Sock, To) ->
 6932:                                        socket:recvfrom(Sock, [], To)
 6933:                                end,
 6934:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 6935:                                  protocol => udp,
 6936:                                  recv     => Recv},
 6937:                    ok = sc_lc_receive_response_udp(InitState)
 6938:            end).
 6939: 
 6940: 
 6941: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6942: %% This test case is intended to test what happens when a socket is 
 6943: %% locally closed while the process is calling the recv function.
 6944: %% Socket is IPv6.
 6945: 
 6946: sc_lc_recvfrom_response_udp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 6947:     ?TT(?SECS(30)),
 6948:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 6949:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 6950:            fun() ->
 6951:                    Recv      = fun(Sock, To) ->
 6952:                                        socket:recvfrom(Sock, [], To)
 6953:                                end,
 6954:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 6955:                                  protocol => udp,
 6956:                                  recv     => Recv},
 6957:                    ok = sc_lc_receive_response_udp(InitState)
 6958:            end).
 6959: 
 6960: 
 6961: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6962: %% This test case is intended to test what happens when a socket is 
 6963: %% locally closed while the process is calling the recv function.
 6964: %% Socket is Unix Domainm (dgram) socket.
 6965: 
 6966: sc_lc_recvfrom_response_udpL(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 6967:     ?TT(?SECS(30)),
 6968:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 6969:            fun() ->
 6970: 		   has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
 6971: 		   is_not_windows()
 6972: 	   end,
 6973:            fun() ->
 6974:                    Recv      = fun(Sock, To) ->
 6975:                                        socket:recvfrom(Sock, [], To)
 6976:                                end,
 6977:                    InitState = #{domain   => local,
 6978:                                  protocol => default,
 6979:                                  recv     => Recv},
 6980:                    ok = sc_lc_receive_response_udp(InitState)
 6981:            end).
 6982: 
 6983: 
 6984: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6985: 
 6986: sc_lc_receive_response_udp(InitState) ->
 6987:     PrimServerSeq =
 6988:         [
 6989:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 6990:          #{desc => "await start",
 6991:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 6992:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 6993:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 6994:                    end},
 6995:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 6996:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6997:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 6998:                            ok
 6999:                    end},
 7000: 
 7001:          %% *** Init part ***
 7002:          #{desc => "local address",
 7003:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 7004:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 7005:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
 7006:                    end},
 7007:          #{desc => "open socket",
 7008:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 7009:                            Sock = sock_open(Domain, dgram, Proto),
 7010:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
 7011:                    end},
 7012:          #{desc => "bind socket",
 7013:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA}) ->
 7014:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 7015:                                ok ->
 7016:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("src bound"),
 7017:                                    ok;
 7018:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 7019:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("src bind failed: ~p", [Reason]),
 7020:                                    ERROR
 7021:                            end
 7022:                    end},
 7023:          #{desc => "socket name",
 7024:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 7025:                            case socket:sockname(Sock) of
 7026:                                {ok, SA} ->
 7027:                                    {ok, State#{sa => SA}};
 7028:                                {error, eafnosupport = Reason} ->
 7029:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Failed get socket name: "
 7030:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 7031:                                    (catch socket:close(Sock)),
 7032:                                    {skip, Reason};
 7033:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 7034:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed get socket name: "
 7035:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 7036:                                    ERROR
 7037:                            end
 7038:                    end},
 7039:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 7040:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, sock := Sock}) ->
 7041:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Sock),
 7042:                            ok
 7043:                    end},
 7044: 
 7045:          %% The actual test
 7046:          #{desc => "await continue (recv, with timeout)",
 7047:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 7048:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv) of
 7049:                                {ok, Timeout} ->
 7050:                                    {ok, State#{timeout => Timeout}};
 7051:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7052:                                    ERROR
 7053:                            end
 7054:                    end},
 7055:          #{desc => "receive, with timeout",
 7056:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv, timeout := Timeout}) ->
 7057:                            case Recv(Sock, Timeout) of
 7058:                                {error, timeout} ->
 7059:                                    ok;
 7060:                                {ok, _} ->
 7061:                                    {error, unexpected_success};
 7062:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7063:                                    ERROR
 7064:                            end
 7065:                    end},
 7066:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv, with timeout)",
 7067:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7068:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv),
 7069:                            ok
 7070:                    end},
 7071:          #{desc => "await continue (close)",
 7072:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 7073:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, close)
 7074:                    end},
 7075:          #{desc => "close socket",
 7076:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
 7077:                          sock     := Sock,
 7078:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
 7079:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 7080:                            State1 =
 7081:                                unlink_path(Path,
 7082:                                            fun() ->
 7083:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
 7084:                                            end,
 7085:                                            fun() -> State end),
 7086:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State1)};
 7087:                       (#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 7088:                            case socket:close(Sock) of
 7089:                                ok ->
 7090:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)};
 7091:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7092:                                    ERROR
 7093:                            end
 7094:                    end},
 7095:          #{desc => "announce ready (close)",
 7096:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7097:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, close),
 7098:                            ok
 7099:                    end},
 7100: 
 7101:          %% Termination
 7102:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 7103:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 7104:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, terminate) of
 7105:                                ok ->
 7106:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 7107:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7108:                                    ERROR
 7109:                            end
 7110:                    end},
 7111: 
 7112:          %% *** We are done ***
 7113:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 7114:         ],
 7115: 
 7116:     SecServerSeq =
 7117:         [
 7118:          %% *** Init part ***
 7119:          #{desc => "await start",
 7120:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 7121:                            {Tester, Sock} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 7122:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, sock => Sock}}
 7123:                    end},
 7124:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 7125:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 7126:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 7127:                            ok
 7128:                    end},
 7129:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 7130:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7131:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 7132:                            ok
 7133:                    end},
 7134: 
 7135:          %% The actual test
 7136:          #{desc => "await continue (recv)",
 7137:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 7138:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv)
 7139:                            
 7140:                    end},
 7141:          #{desc => "receive",
 7142:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv} = State) ->
 7143:                            case Recv(Sock, infinity) of
 7144:                                {error, closed} ->
 7145:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)};
 7146:                                {ok, _} ->
 7147:                                    {error, unexpected_success};
 7148:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7149:                                    ERROR
 7150:                            end
 7151:                    end},
 7152:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv closed)",
 7153:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7154:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_closed),
 7155:                            ok
 7156:                    end},
 7157: 
 7158:          %% Termination
 7159:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 7160:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 7161:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 7162:                                ok ->
 7163:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 7164:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7165:                                    ERROR
 7166:                            end
 7167:                    end},
 7168: 
 7169:          %% *** We are done ***
 7170:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 7171:         ],
 7172: 
 7173: 
 7174:     TesterSeq =
 7175:         [
 7176:          %% *** Init part ***
 7177:          #{desc => "monitor primary server",
 7178:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_server := Pid} = _State) ->
 7179:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 7180:                            ok
 7181:                    end},
 7182:          #{desc => "monitor secondary server 1",
 7183:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7184:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 7185:                            ok
 7186:                    end},
 7187:          #{desc => "monitor secondary server 2",
 7188:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7189:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 7190:                            ok
 7191:                    end},
 7192:          #{desc => "monitor secondary server 3",
 7193:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server3 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7194:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 7195:                            ok
 7196:                    end},
 7197: 
 7198:          %% Start the primary server
 7199:          #{desc => "order 'primary server' start",
 7200:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_server := Pid} = _State) ->
 7201:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 7202:                            ok
 7203:                    end},
 7204:          #{desc => "await 'primary server' ready (init)",
 7205:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_server := Pid} = State) ->
 7206:                            {ok, Sock} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, prim_server, init),
 7207:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
 7208:                    end},
 7209: 
 7210:          %% Start the secondary server 1
 7211:          #{desc => "order 'secondary server 1' start",
 7212:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server1 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
 7213:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Sock),
 7214:                            ok
 7215:                    end},
 7216:          #{desc => "await 'secondary server 1' ready (init)",
 7217:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7218:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, sec_server1, init)
 7219:                    end},
 7220: 
 7221:          %% Start the secondary server 2
 7222:          #{desc => "order 'secondary server 2' start",
 7223:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server2 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
 7224:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Sock),
 7225:                            ok
 7226:                    end},
 7227:          #{desc => "await 'secondary server 2' ready (init)",
 7228:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7229:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, sec_server2, init)
 7230:                    end},
 7231: 
 7232:          %% Start the secondary server 3
 7233:          #{desc => "order 'secondary server 3' start",
 7234:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server3 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
 7235:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Sock),
 7236:                            ok
 7237:                    end},
 7238:          #{desc => "await 'secondary server 3' ready (init)",
 7239:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server3 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7240:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, sec_server3, init)
 7241:                    end},
 7242: 
 7243: 
 7244:          %% The actual test
 7245:          %% Make all the seondary servers continue, with an infinite recvfrom
 7246:          %% and then the prim-server with a timed recvfrom.
 7247:          %% After the prim server notifies us (about the timeout) we order it
 7248:          %% to close the socket, which should cause the all the secondary 
 7249:          %% server to return with error-closed.
 7250: 
 7251:          #{desc => "order 'secondary server 1' to continue (recv)",
 7252:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7253:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
 7254:                            ok
 7255:                    end},
 7256:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 7257:          #{desc => "order 'secondary server 2' to continue (recv)",
 7258:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7259:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
 7260:                            ok
 7261:                    end},
 7262:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 7263:          #{desc => "order 'secondary server 3' to continue (recv)",
 7264:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server3 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7265:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
 7266:                            ok
 7267:                    end},
 7268:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 7269:          #{desc => "order 'primary server' to continue (recv, with timeout)",
 7270:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_server := Pid} = _State) ->
 7271:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv, ?SECS(5)),
 7272:                            ok
 7273:                    end},
 7274:          #{desc => "await 'primary server' ready (recv, with timeout)",
 7275:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_server := Pid} = _State) ->
 7276:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, prim_server, recv)
 7277:                    end},
 7278:          #{desc => "order 'primary server' to continue (close)",
 7279:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_server := Pid} = _State) ->
 7280:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, close),
 7281:                            ok
 7282:                    end},
 7283:          #{desc => "await 'primary server' ready (close)",
 7284:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_server := Pid} = _State) ->
 7285:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, prim_server, close)
 7286:                    end},
 7287:          #{desc => "await 'secondary server 1' ready (closed)",
 7288:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7289:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, sec_server1, recv_closed)
 7290:                    end},
 7291:          #{desc => "await 'secondary server 2' ready (closed)",
 7292:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7293:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, sec_server2, recv_closed)
 7294:                    end},
 7295:          #{desc => "await 'secondary server 3' ready (closed)",
 7296:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server3 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7297:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, sec_server3, recv_closed)
 7298:                    end},
 7299: 
 7300:          %% Terminations
 7301:          #{desc => "order 'secondary server 3' to terminate",
 7302:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server3 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7303:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 7304:                            ok
 7305:                    end},
 7306:          #{desc => "await 'secondary server 3' termination",
 7307:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server3 := Pid} = State) ->
 7308:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 7309:                                ok ->
 7310:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sec_server3, State)};
 7311:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7312:                                    ERROR
 7313:                            end
 7314:                    end},
 7315:          #{desc => "order 'secondary server 2' to terminate",
 7316:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7317:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 7318:                            ok
 7319:                    end},
 7320:          #{desc => "await 'secondary server 2' termination",
 7321:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server2 := Pid} = State) ->
 7322:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 7323:                                ok ->
 7324:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sec_server2, State)};
 7325:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7326:                                    ERROR
 7327:                            end
 7328:                    end},
 7329:          #{desc => "order 'secondary server 1' to terminate",
 7330:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7331:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 7332:                            ok
 7333:                    end},
 7334:          #{desc => "await 'secondary server 1' termination",
 7335:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_server1 := Pid} = State) ->
 7336:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 7337:                                ok ->
 7338:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sec_server1, State)};
 7339:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7340:                                    ERROR
 7341:                            end
 7342:                    end},
 7343:          #{desc => "order 'primary server' to terminate",
 7344:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_server := Pid} = _State) ->
 7345:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 7346:                            ok
 7347:                    end},
 7348:          #{desc => "await 'primary server' termination",
 7349:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_server := Pid} = State) ->
 7350:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 7351:                                ok ->
 7352:                                    {ok, maps:remove(prim_server, State)};
 7353:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7354:                                    ERROR
 7355:                            end
 7356:                    end},
 7357: 
 7358: 
 7359:          %% *** We are done ***
 7360:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 7361:         ],
 7362:     
 7363: 
 7364:     i("start 'primary server' evaluator"),
 7365:     PrimSrvInitState = InitState,
 7366:     PrimServer = ?SEV_START("prim-server", PrimServerSeq, PrimSrvInitState),
 7367: 
 7368:     i("start 'secondary server 1' evaluator"),
 7369:     SecSrvInitState = #{recv => maps:get(recv, InitState)},
 7370:     SecServer1 = ?SEV_START("sec-server-1", SecServerSeq, SecSrvInitState),
 7371: 
 7372:     i("start 'secondary server 2' evaluator"),
 7373:     SecServer2 = ?SEV_START("sec-server-2", SecServerSeq, SecSrvInitState),
 7374: 
 7375:     i("start 'secondary server 3' evaluator"),
 7376:     SecServer3 = ?SEV_START("sec-server-3", SecServerSeq, SecSrvInitState),
 7377: 
 7378:     i("start 'tester' evaluator"),
 7379:     TesterInitState = #{prim_server => PrimServer#ev.pid,
 7380:                         sec_server1 => SecServer1#ev.pid,
 7381:                         sec_server2 => SecServer2#ev.pid,
 7382:                         sec_server3 => SecServer3#ev.pid},
 7383:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 7384: 
 7385:     i("await evaluator"),
 7386:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([PrimServer, 
 7387:                             SecServer1, SecServer2, SecServer3,
 7388:                             Tester]).
 7389: 
 7390:

 7394: %% locally closed while the process is calling the recvmsg function.
 7395: %% Socket is IPv4.

 7397: sc_lc_recvmsg_response_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 7398:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 7399:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 7400:            fun() ->
 7401:                    is_not_windows(), % recvmsg does not work on Windows
 7402:                    has_support_ipv4()
 7403:            end,
 7404:            fun() ->
 7405:                    Recv      = fun(Sock) -> socket:recvmsg(Sock) end,
 7406:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 7407:                                  protocol => tcp,
 7408:                                  recv     => Recv},
 7409:                    ok = sc_lc_receive_response_tcp(InitState)
 7410:            end).

 7536: %% git the setup anyway.
